detaileddescription.para: If deferred deletion is enabled, how long to wait before we delete task?
Pointer to function that implements the task
Priority of the task. Int between 0 and 7
Number of words allocated to the stack of the task
Handle of freeRTOS task control block
how we communicate with the task rn - THIS SUCKS SO BAD
arguments for the specific task, this is where we will likely pass in task settings
info about the parent of the task
how we will be communicating in the future

listitem.para: Bits 0:1 - | Task MGMT | Vehicle Application task - 01 | Periodic SVC Task - 10 | Dormant SVC Task - 11
Bit 2 - Log task start + stop time
Bit 4 - SCD ignore flag (only use if task is application layer
Bits 11:12 - Deadline firmness | No enforcement - 00 | Gradual Priority Incrimentation - 01 | Firm deadline 10 | Critical Deadline - 11
Bit 13 - mission critical, if this specific task crashes, the car will not continue to run
Bit 14 - Task currently delaying, either by vTaskDelay or vTaskDelayUntil

detaileddescription.para: How much to throttle the task

briefdescription.para: This struct is designed to hold neccessary information about an RTOS task that will be managed by uvfr_state_engine.

detaileddescription.para: Pay close attention, because this is one of the most cursed structs in the project, as well as one of the most important
